name: The final days of Golgafrincham
description:
This game was made for the Towel Day Warm Up 2022 Game Jam. It is based on the second book of the Hitchhiker trilogy, The Restaurant at the End of the Universe by Douglas Adams.

You are John. The last phone sanitiser on Golgafrincham. You must clean all dirty phones before someone uses them.

Have you what it takes to prevent doom of Golgafrincham?

You'll need about 10-30 minutes to finish the game, depending on your cleaning skills :-) Currently, no save game feature is implemented.

How to play: Move using WASD or the Arrow keys, Interact using the space bar. 

Game Art by LimeZu (https://limezu.itch.io/)
